definitions.definition: A character played by an actor .
The mask or appearance one presents to the world.
examples: He keeps his online persona completely separate from his real-world one.

definitions.definition: An imaginary person representing a particular type of client or customer, considered when designing products and services that will appeal to them.

secondary_definitions: A character played by an actor .
( psychology ) The mask or appearance one presents to the world.
( marketing , user experience ) An imaginary person representing a particular type of client or customer, considered when designing products and services that will appeal to them.
